about_the_game:
PockeDate! – Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

Meet Akari – your virtual sweetheart, head over heels for you. But be careful not to let her down! You wouldn't want to make her sad, would you?

PockeDate! isn’t just a fun game – it's also a training ground for real-life dating! Through engaging interactions and unique scenarios, you'll learn how to communicate better, handle awkward moments, and make your date feel special. Get ready to boost your dating skills and confidence while having a blast with Akari!

Features:

  • Free!

  • Familiar date spots with unique twists each time.

  • Adorable girl who forgives all your awkwardness!

  • Cozy, heartwarming atmosphere.

  • Secret dates to discover!

  • Charming pixel art graphics.

  • Original soundtrack.

Get ready for the cutest, most heartwarming dates of your life with PockeDate!

PockeDate! - Pocket Dating Simulator is a visual novel where players read text, make choices, and influence the story's outcome. The game has an auto-save and auto-load function. The game does not guarantee the appearance of a real girlfriend after gaining experience in this game.

Dear Participant,

Your experience in PockeDate may include unsettling or frightening moments. While Akari is here to comfort you, her current state may occasionally become unstable due to unresolved system issues.

We advises caution. Unexpected events are part of this experiment.

Thank you for your participation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

movies.name: Pocket Dating 【Official Original Song MV】 PockeDate!

name: PockeDate! - Pocket Dating Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
